title: The Science Fiction Hall Of Fame Vols I & II
description:
Volume I (PDF) found on interwebz
 Volume II A (DOCX) collected on my own
 Volume II B (DOCX) found on TPB
 included novel-length Children Of The Atom (continuation of In Hiding)
 and Rogue Moon (continuation of, well, Rogue Moon)
 Universe is also a part of Orphans Of The Sky, which I didn't include, but it's easily available
